name: Daigon Express Railway
description:
Guide the trains to their destinations!

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard.

Mouse: Left click to select tracks from the left-hand panel, or place selected tracks on the field.

Num Keys 1-7: Choose tracks

Q, E, D, A keys: Choose specific corner pieces

W key: Choose cross piece (tunnel: trains can pass over/under each other)

Credits:

Programming: Billy Bao, Connor Chang

UI: Lena Jeon

Art: Lily Yeh, Lena Jeon, Kenney.nl's Free Game Assets

Sound Effects: Sif V.

Button Click Sound Effect: Zapsplat

Music: Anson Tiong, Sif V.

Font: RPG System by Axel Lymphos

Known Bugs:

  • Sometimes, an obstacle can spawn in a position that makes the game unwinnable
